data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I wish that we could come to an agreement about what city to move to. We've ____ arguing ____ this ____ months. If ____ had ____ up ____ minds ____ we ____ talked ____ it, we ____ have ____ moved ____ to ____ new ____ for ____ by ____. We both like both locations, so why is it so hard for us to settle on one?
data.partBlankContent: I wish that we could come to an agreement about what city to move to. We've be__ arguing ab___ this f__ months. If w_ had ma__ up o__ minds wh__ we fi___ talked ab___ it, we wo___ have be__ moved i_ to o__ new pl___ for we___ by n__. We both like both locations, so why is it so hard for us to settle on one?
data.fullContent: I wish that we could come to an agreement about what city to move to. We've been arguing about this for months. If we had made up our minds when we first talked about it, we would have been moved in to one new place for weeks by now. We both like both locations, so why is it so hard for us to settle on one?
data.answer: 我希望我们能就搬到哪个城市来达成一致意见。我们已经为此争论了好几个月了。如果我们第一次谈论这件事的时候就下定决心了，那么到现在我们已经搬进一个新地方好几个星期了。两个地方我们都喜欢，为什么我们就这么难定下来呢?
